Just east of I-75, Waterlefe Golf & River Club is located minutes north of Sarasota in Manatee County . In choosing a new home, remember to consider the value of community and lifestyle . The 617 homes in the Waterlefe Community offer a variety of designs and features to accommodate your individual lifestyle. In addition to our celebrated golf course, there is boating at your back door, fishing, kayaking, nature trails, spectacular river views, dining & entertainment opportunities, a network of amazing neighbors, and much more! Explore the album of WATERLEFE PROPERTY PHOTOS here. Discover MEMBERSHIP TYPES at Waterlefe Golf & River Club. Learn about COMMUNITY MANAGEMENT / RESIDENT SERVICES here. Review the DECLARATION OF COVENANTS. FIND A REAL ESTATE AGENT. Click here to SCHEDULE A TOUR OR ASK A QUESTION. Selling A Waterlefe Property? REALTORS: Click here for more helpful information . HOMEOWNERS: Please send estoppel requests to the Community Association Manager at mpoa@waterlefefl.com. Looking for a realtor? We encourage you to contact the agents who live in the neighborhood – click here to explore the list. You may also find these additional resources helpful. Shopping for a home in Waterlefe? Potential homeowners looking to explore real estate options within Waterlefe Golf and River Club are encouraged to contact the agents who live in the neighborhood – click here to explore the list. You may also click here for additional information & resources to aid in your buying decision. Home Rentals in Waterlefe HOMEOWNER RESOURCES: Lease Registration Form See something on Waterlefe property that needs repair? To report any maintenance issue within Waterlefe, contact Community Management and we will be your guide. Members, log in and visit Member Central for more information… Already living the life in Waterlefe? Waterlefe Golf Club - Naples Golf Homes | Naples Golf Guy Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com Back to Greater Sarasota Golf Communities Waterlefe Golf Club Waterlefe Golf & River Club is a semi-private country club in Bradenton, Florida. Waterlefe’s 18-hole championship golf course is situated on 172 picturesque acres and boasts five signature holes that border the Manatee River. With six different tee options, there is a tee box for everyone at all skill levels. The River Club at Waterlefe is the main gathering point of social activity. Residents can enjoy fine dining or take in one of the spectacular Florida sunsets. Residents also have access to a state-of-the-art fitness center, walking trails, saltwater lap pool, poolside Tiki Bar and a very active social calendar. The Waterlefe Marian Club has 59 slips along the river ranging in size from 20 feet to 29 feet. The Gulf of Mexico is just a short ride downriver. A gated golf community located in Northern Bradenton with 621 properties including condos, villas, single-family and waterfront estate homes. One of the few communities with both a golf course and a Marina along the Gulf Coast. The Naples Golf Guy Team specializes in helping buyers and sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida Golf Communities, contact us today for more information. Location: Bradenton, Florida Club Type: Semi-Private Country Club Membership Type: Pay as you play or Annual Pass Real Estate Waterlefe Homes for Sale $400,000 – $1,395,000 View Homes For Sale The Naples Golf Guy Team has 20 years of experience helping Buyers and Sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida. Call, text or email us today for more information. Stay informed with automatic property alerts… Learn what your home is worth… Sign up for our monthly market report. Yes Membership Fees Golf Membership Initiation Fee: $7,500 Annual Golf Dues: $6,300 Social Membership Initiation Fee: Not Available Annual Social Dues: Not Available Please be aware, other membership options may be available. Additional fees such as capital assessments, a food and beverage minimum, trail fee or taxes may apply. Please feel free to contact us for additional information. Waterlefe Memberships – Waterlefe MPOA Login ABOUT LIVE HERE GOLF HERE BOAT HERE DINE HERE THRIVE HERE MEMBER CENTRAL CONTACT US Resident/Member Log In DISCOVER WATERLEFE MEMBERSHIPS Find out what Waterlefe can offer YOU. From being a community resident to being a curious visitor, there is so much to discover and enjoy… RESIDENTIAL / MPOA / RIVER CLUB MEMBERSHIP : Through payment of regular HOA dues, homeowners and renting residents are considered full-access Members of the MPOA and the stunning River Club facilities and amenities. As a resident of Waterlefe, you and your guests will enjoy exclusive access to: ALL River Club dining/entertainment/special event opportunities (there are many), the 24/7 Fitness Center, a variety of weekly fitness classes (most are included), the resort-style swimming pool and Tiki Bar, community library, outdoor fun at The Pointe, and much more. The MPOA also offers Members a variety of unique, convenient programs, services, & benefits. Members: Log in to find out more… The River Club is NOT open to the public , and all attached services and facilities are limited to use by Residential Members and their guests ONLY, but we do offer/allow rental of our venue for weddings and banquets (up to 120 guests). More details and tours of The River Club facilities/amenities can be arranged/provided by request – email: Reception@WaterlefeFL.com Reciprocal Memberships and Culinary/Social Memberships allow access to some River Club dining opportunities. Learn more below… GOLF CLUB MEMBERSHIP / GOLF FACILITY INFORMATION : Golf Membership is separate from / additional to Residential Membership and can be arranged directly with the Golf Club/CDD . Visit their website, waterlefegolfandriverclub.com , for more information. The Golf Club and course are also open to the public, and therefore their Pro Shop and dining facilities ( The Shank Shack food truck, and The Grill Room ) are available for anyone to visit and enjoy. Golf Members may also upgrade/add on a Culinary Reciprocal Membership which allows access to some River Club dining. Click here or scroll below to learn more … CULINARY / SOCIAL MEMBERSHIPS : FULL CULINARY PROGRAM: This program is a membership offering for candidates who are sponsored non-residents of Waterlefe Golf and River Club. This limited membership requires a one-time, $500 Capital Contribution Fee, sponsorship by a Waterlefe Resident, Golf Member, and Marina Club member and is open to friends, associates, and family members. In the event a candidate does not have a Member sponsor, an interview may be required. This membership includes the use of A La Carte Dining in the River Club, the Bistro, and Poolside Tiki Bar, and allows members to attend all events hosted by the River Club. Full Culinary Members will put a valid credit card on file and will be issued a membership card to use at the various facilities. This membership does NOT include the use of the Pool or Fitness Center. To join or get more information, click here for the form and send it to Club Manager, Dan Adkins: dadkins@waterlefefl.com . CULINARY RECIPROCAL PROGRAM : This program is offered to existing Golf Members, Marina Club Members, and Card Group Members as an upgrade to their existing Membership. This membership includes using A La Carte Dining in the River Club, the Bistro, and the poolside Tiki Bar. Culinary Reciprocal Members will put a valid credit card on file and will be issued a membership card to use at the various facilities. This membership does not currently require a fee. This Membership does NOT include use of the Pool, Fitness Center, or access to any special events hosted by the River Club. To join or get more information, click here for the form and send it to Club Manager, Dan Adkins: DAdkins@WaterlefeFL.com About Live Here Golf Here Boat Here Dine Here Thrive Here Contact Get in Touch MPOA Office / CAM: 941-747-6898 | MPOA@WaterlefeFL.com Open Mondays: 8am-3pm | Tues-Fri: 9am-4pm Located downstairs at The River Club: 995 Fish Hook Cove Bradenton, FL 34212 General Inquiries: 941-744-9881 | Reception@WaterlefeFL.com River Club Dining & Events: 941-253-5333 | RCDining@WaterlefeFL.com Marina Club: WaterlefeMarinaBOD@gmail.com Golf Club & Grille Room: 941-744-0393 | WaterlefeGolfAndRiverClub.com Open Daily: 7am-6pm | CDD Operated Located on the S.W. Corner of the parking lot: 1022 Fish Hook Cove Bradenton, FL 34212 © Copyright 2025. All Right Reserved.

Waterlefe Golf and River Club Membership and Club Information Home Private Clubs Real Estate Golf Certified Agent Directory Golf Homes For Sale Lifestyle Golf Resorts Travel Golf Products More Contact Golf Life Navigators News & Insights Start Here! ✕ Welcome to Waterlefe Golf and River Club Bradenton, Florida Contact Waterlefe Golf and River Club For More Information About The Club Membership Golf Dining Marina Contact & Location About The Club Welcome to Waterlefe Golf and River Club Welcome to Waterlefe Golf & River Club, where our slogan, “You Deserve the Best…..You Deserve Waterlefe” becomes a reality! Our golf course is situated within a natural setting among five unforgettable signature golf holes that border the Manatee River. Designed by Ted McAnlis, our championship par 72 course offers eight different tees ranging from 4,800 yards to 6,900 yards that are challenging and fun for golfers of all skill levels. Host to the US Open Qualifier an unprecedented seven times, the Waterlefe golf course is renowned for excellent course conditions and most notably received the “Top 25 Golf Courses in Florida” award from Golf Advisor. Waterlefe also boasts Trip Advisor’s Certificate of Exellence award. Embraced by the beauty of natural preserves and wildlife, this residential golf community was developed for those who have a passion for fine living, an exceptional golf experience, and life on the water. Membership Membership at Waterlefe Golf and River Club This is an unprecedented opportunity to join fellow golf enthusiasts as a member of one of the most celebrated semi-private golf clubs in the country. Waterlefe offers annual “Passport” Golf Memberships to both residents and non-residents of our community. With multiple membership categories, Waterlefe provides a true “Golf Club” experience that includes both social and competitive golf events. Benefits of membership include but are not limited to the following: Unlimited golf with no green fees. Passport members have preferred tee times. Reserve your times up to two weeks in advance and play when you want to play! Play in special events organized just for you including men’s leagues, ladies’ leagues and couples tournaments. Unlimited range balls. The driving range is open to our members until the sun sets. Complimentary golf bag storage. Reciprocal golf privileges from May 1 – October 31. Dining privileges at the Waterlefe River Club.  No F&B minimum! Rediscover GOLF the way it was meant to be played! You deserve the best….you deserve Waterlefe! Golf Golf at Waterlefe Golf and River Club “If one looks at the world’s finest courses, all have one thing in common – memorable holes. Waterlefe will share at least that much with the world’s finest, for it will have not only memorable, but unforgettable holes. The course starts, touches at times and ends on a particularly beautiful section of the Manatee River, replete with wide expanses of pristine marshes and pleasant coves, and the player should not be surprised if, on the 15th tee, he or she spots a family of manatees poking their noses up for a breath of air. Waterlefe has not been an easy course to develop, and a great amount of time, effort and expense went into protecting, and where necessary restoring, the very environment that gives the course it’s unique character. The course will present both challenge and beauty to players of differing abilities. From the ‘tips’ Waterlefe will be a real tiger (try the par 3, 230 yard 9th hole – all marsh from tee to green). Members will find play from the other tees to be more forgiving, although certainly not a pushover. From any of the 5 sets of tees provided, Waterlefe® will present a memorable – even unforgettable – golfing experience.” – Ted McAnlis Dining Dining at Waterlefe Golf and River Club Sunset Grille at Waterlefe Golf Club After your round of golf, our clubhouse offers the perfect place to unwind with your favorite beverage and relive the best moments of the day. Whether you’re in the mood for a hearty breakfast, a casual lunch, happy hour drinks, or one of our daily chef specials, the Sunset Grille has something for everyone. Come relax and enjoy the view! River Club at Waterlefe Welcome to the best-kept secret on the Manatee River. Our River Club offers everything from club-made pizza to filet mignon, all served impeccably by a professional staff that knows you by name and how to make your evening just right. It is no wonder that our homeowners and members love to gather here. Marina Marina at Waterlefe Golf and River Club The Waterlefe Marina Club is an equity membership club that offers our member boating enthusiasts a high quality marina facility. The Club, the only residential marina directly on the Manatee River, maintains 59 slips ranging in size from 20 to 29 feet. The Club is a not-for-profit corporation, managed by an elected Board of three members. The Club has an annual budget funded by members’ dues which cover fresh water, electricity, insurance, common area lighting, maintenance/cleaning of the docks, and 24-hour Video Surveillance/Security. Members are assigned slips and have the flexibility to rent their assigned slips when they are “between” boats. Due to our convenient location, club members can board their boats and immediately enjoy water sports of all kinds, and with just a short trip downriver to the Gulf of Mexico experience world-class river and flats fishing, offshore fishing and cruising to the numerous restaurants and recreational facilities.
